alert.note: Alert for Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 02 at 11:05AM MST until February 03 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Pueblo County and the lower elevations of western Las Animas county. * WHEN...Until Midnight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
